2.4 Site Inspections

on-site assessment was conducted as a part of verification activity and involved:

An

1) an assessment of the implementation and operation of the VCS project activity as per the validated PD

2) a review of information flows for generating, aggregating and reporting of the monitoring parameters

3) interviews with relevant personnel to confirm that the operational and data collection procedures are implemented in accordance with the Monitoring Plan

4) a cross-check between information provided in the MR and data from other sources

5) a check of the monitoring equipment including calibration performance, and observations of monitoring practices against the requirements of the PD and the applied methodology

6) A review of calculations and assumptions made in determining the GHG data and ERs, and

w

7) An identification of QA/QC procedures in place to prevent, or identify and correct, any errors or omissions in the reported monitoring parameters.
